block.p: Betsy Leigh Hausknecht, a daughter of Dorene Horowitz of Pleasantville, N.Y., and Dr. Allan Hausknecht of Island Park, N.Y., was married last evening in Amenia, N.Y., to Jeffrey David Clachko, the son of Gayle Clachko and Dr. Marc Clachko of Wyckoff, N.J. Rabbi Joseph Potasnik officiated at Troutbeck, an inn.

Next month, Mrs. Clachko, 26, is to begin her second year of medical school at the State University Health Science Center at Brooklyn. She graduated from the University of Vermont. Her father, a neurologist, is a partner in Comprehensive Care of New York in Hewlett, N.Y. He is also the chief of neurology at St. John's Episcopal Hospital and at Peninsula Hospital Center, both in Far Rockaway, N.Y. Her mother, a senior vice president of HSBC Bank USA, works in New Rochelle, N.Y., where she oversees the Westchester and Putnam regions. The bride is a stepdaughter of Moshe Horowitz.

Betsy Leigh Hausknecht, a daughter of Dorene Horowitz of Pleasantville, N.Y., and Dr. Allan Hausknecht of Island Park, N.Y., was married last evening in Amenia, N.Y., to Jeffrey David Clachko, the son of Gayle Clachko and Dr. Marc Clachko of Wyckoff, N.J. Rabbi Joseph Potasnik officiated at Troutbeck, an inn.

Next month, Mrs. Clachko, 26, is to begin her second year of medical school at the State University Health Science Center at Brooklyn. She graduated from the University of Vermont. Her father, a neurologist, is a partner in Comprehensive Care of New York in Hewlett, N.Y. He is also the chief of neurology at St. John's Episcopal Hospital and at Peninsula Hospital Center, both in Far Rockaway, N.Y. Her mother, a senior vice president of HSBC Bank USA, works in New Rochelle, N.Y., where she oversees the Westchester and Putnam regions. The bride is a stepdaughter of Moshe Horowitz.

Mr. Clachko, 27, is an advertising account executive in New York for NBC. He graduated from Colgate University. His father, an obstetrician and gynecologist, practices in River Edge, N.J., and is the assistant chairman of the obstetrics and gynecology department at Hackensack (N.J.) University Medical Center. The bridegroom's mother, a psychotherapist, has a private practice in Ridgewood, N.J., and is the director of student services at Yavneh Academy in Paramus, N.J.
